trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when attempting to apply an operator to incompatible operands when you evaluate a rule.
trans-unit.target: 计算规则时试图对不兼容的操作数应用某一运算符时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> that contains the error message to associate with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含要与此实例关联的错误消息的 <see langword="string" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the message parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用消息参数初始化新实例的 <xref:System.ArgumentException.Message%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 Exception 实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化过程中调用此构造函数来重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializeInfo" /> is a null reference (Visual Basic <see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializeInfo" /> 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: The class name is a null reference (Visual Basic <see langword="Nothing" />) or the <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: 类名为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）或者 <see cref="P:System.Exception.HResult" /> 为零。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of this <see cref="T:System.Exception" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对导致此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 的内部 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的引用初始化 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 作为前一个 <xref:System.Exception> 的直接结果而引发的 <xref:System.Exception> 应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包括对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>）。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> .
trans-unit.target: 描述当前 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 出现在运算符左边的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" /> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: 表示兼容性发生冲突的运算符的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 出现在运算符右边的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 用兼容性冲突的详细信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了由此类表示的 Exception 实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `message`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `message` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `left.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `left.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `op.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `op.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `right.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `right.` 的值

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the current <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> .
trans-unit.target: 描述当前 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> appearing on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 出现在运算符左边的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" /> representing the operator whose compatibility is violated.
trans-unit.target: 表示兼容性发生冲突的运算符的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> appearing on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 出现在运算符右边的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> class with the details of the compatibility violation.
trans-unit.target: 用兼容性冲突的详细信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This includes the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of Exception represented by this class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了由此类表示的 Exception 实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The value of the argument `ex.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `ex.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `message`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `message` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `left.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `left.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `op.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `op.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument `right.`
trans-unit.target: 参数 `right.` 的值

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用关于异常的信息设置 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.GetObjectData%2A> sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException> object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException.GetObjectData%2A> 用针对于序列化的所有 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> 对象数据设置 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationIncompatibleTypesException>。

trans-unit.source: During de-serialization, this exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化期间，从通过流传输的 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> 重建此异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引发异常的表达式左边参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the left argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发异常的表达式左边参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" /> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示引发异常的运算符的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" /> representing the operator which caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 表示引发异常的运算符的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeBinaryOperatorType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引发异常的表达式右边参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the right argument of the expression causing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发异常的表达式右边参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。
